thread.title: Raw sewage, rat and mouse droppings discovered behind the scenes of café, inspectors reveal
thread.title_full: Raw sewage, rat and mouse droppings discovered behind the scenes of café, inspectors reveal

title: Raw sewage, rat and mouse droppings discovered behind the scenes of café, inspectors reveal
text: Raw sewage, rat and mouse droppings discovered behind the scenes of café, inspectors reveal Independent.ie Health Inspectors have uncovered filthy and stomach-churning hygiene breaches in the kitchens of restaurants, takeaways, pubs and hotels – placing customers at risk of potentially serious illness. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/news/raw-sewage-rat-and-mouse-droppings-discovered-behind-the-scenes-of-caf-inspectors-reveal-35354926.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35109148.ece/1511f/AUTOCROP/h342/burger.PNG The worst offenders, which were flagrantly ignoring health rules, were subjected to closure orders by inspectors from the Food Safety Authority of Ireland (FSAI) in 2016 Health Inspectors have uncovered filthy and stomach-churning hygiene breaches in the kitchens of restaurants, takeaways, pubs and hotels – placing customers at risk of potentially serious illness.
